The setVisible method makes the Tube object visible

The setxCoord method sets the bird's x-coordinate to the passed in value of xCoord

The setyCoord method is a mutator for the Tube object's y coordinate

SHORT_PIPE_TOP_Y_SPAWN - Static variable in class model.Tube
 
spawn() - Method in class model.Bird
The spawn method sets the bird's position to it's default starting coordinates
spawn() - Method in class model.Tube
The spawn method spawns the tube on the right side of the screen and either on the top or bottom of the screen depending on topTube's boolean value
spawnRegularTube(boolean) - Method in class model.Tube
The spawnRegularTube method re-positions the tube's y-coordinate to make it appear as "regular size"
spawnShortTube(boolean) - Method in class model.Tube
The spawnShortTube method re-positions the tube's y-coordinate to make it appear as "short size"
spawnTallTube(boolean) - Method in class model.Tube
The spawnTallTube method re-positions the tube's y-coordinate to make it appear as "tall size"

start(Stage) - Method in class application.FlappyBirdApp
The start method initializes the GUI
startGame(Button) - Method in class controller.FlappyBirdMenuController
The startGame method detects a space bar press and subsequently starts the game
startGameHandler() - Method in class controller.FlappyBirdMenuController
The startGameHandler method contains a listener for a space bar press which will start the game
syncHitBox() - Method in class model.Bird
The syncHitBox method sets aligns the bird's hit box coordinates with it's sprite coordinates
syncHitBox() - Method in class model.Tube
The syncHitBox method sets aligns the tube's hit box coordinates with it's sprite coordinates
